description: {"blocks":[{"key":"eo3uh","text":"On receiving wild type or tranformed S. elongatus plates, one needs to revive them for further studies. Revival of S. elongatus involves making its liquid culture in BG-11 medium. The following protocol describes the liquid culture preparation from BG-11 plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ridt","text":"Take a    autoclaved flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2u371","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a63re","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdv2s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"D2967180327511ECA0C86BBC43C76C7E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9ef3","text":"Remove the foil on the flask for aeration purposes.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"63gsb","text":"Take a    aliquot of BG-11 solution in a falcon tube and transfer it into the flask. Keep the flask aside","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"abil0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c0ba8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8b3gn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"DCD064D0327511ECA0C86BBC43C76C7E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5khdb","text":"Carry out this process and all the successive steps inside a laminar airflow hood","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9p76p","text":"Dip the pipette tip in the aliquot of the BG-11 medium and gently mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3cev","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97om3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bsa1r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9o749","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"412h8","text":"To mix, gently resuspend the liquid 1-2 times.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93bc2","text":"Take the cyanobacteria plate and gently scrape it with the tip of a 1 mL loaded micropipette. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6ssh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lvf9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cibp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ejeti","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d346m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7m7br","text":"Position the plate such that the streaked part faces the roof of the laminar hood, remove the lid carefully and place it upside down. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bpbi8","text":" For the engineered strains, apply appropriate antibiotics (10μg/mL kanamycin and 4μg/mL gentamicin) in the BG-11 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2h70","text":"Store all the flasks in a photo incubator at 15000 lux,    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f7m7o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"10B44010327A11ECA0C86BBC43C76C7E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"150","start":null,"temperature":"37","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

title: Revival of S. elongatus from plates
